name: New Vertical Mega Ramp Car
description:
New Vertical Mega Ramp Car is new form of mega ramp with vertical ramp of car racing games with new feature of mega ramp transform car stunts . Be the impossible mega ramp transformer and jump sky high on the vertical grand ramp to perform ramp stunts and car crash destruction in mega ramp games.

FEATURES
- Mid-air mega ramp environment
- Different modern sports cars to select
- Different 3D view of the high jump, bungee jump, crazy jump
- Thrilling background sound of the car stunt
- Unlock the speedy sports cars
